text: The University of Botswana, popularly known as UB, was created in 1982 as the first university in Botswana. The university has three campuses: one in the capital city Gaborone, one in Francistown, and another in Maun. The university is divided into six faculties: Business, Education, Engineering, Humanities, Science and Social Sciences and the University of Botswana School of Medicine.http://uninews.unimelb.edu.au/articleid_1252.html accessed 2008-09-18 ==References== Category:1982 establishments in Africa Category:Colleges and universities in Africa Category:Organizations based in Botswana
title: University of Botswana
